entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
